paramSchema.title: Hostname
paramSchema.name: hostname
paramSchema.description: The hostname of the MySQL Server (Socket Path or Hostname is required)

paramSchema.title: Port
paramSchema.name: port
paramSchema.description: Port to use when accessing the MySQL Server

paramSchema.title: Socket Path
paramSchema.name: socketPath
paramSchema.description: The Socket Path used to access the MySQL Server (Socket Path or Hostname is required)

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: Username to the access the MySQL database

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: Pasword to the access the MySQL database

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the mysql data.  It will default to the hostname of the server
